Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: நீங்கான் வெகுளி நிறையிலன் எஞ்ஞான்றும்யாங்கணும் யார்க்கும் எளிது.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He who neither refrains from anger nor keeps his secrets will at all times and in all places be easily conquered by all.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A flawed individual is shown. A fiery aura of ceaseless anger ('நீங்கான் வெகுளி') surrounds his head. His heart is depicted as an open book, revealing all his secrets for everyone to see ('நிறையிலன்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Because of these two weaknesses, he is shown being effortlessly defeated ('எளிது') in a variety of situations and places ('எஞ்ஞான்றும் யாங்கணும்').
Layered_Composition.Background: In the background, a montage of his defeats: a tiny child outsmarts him in a game, a simple merchant cheats him in a deal, a weak enemy overpowers him in a fight. He is vulnerable to everyone ('யார்க்கும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The person who cannot control their anger and cannot keep a secret makes themselves universally vulnerable, easily defeated by anyone, anywhere, at any time.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The fiery aura of anger and the open book of the heart are direct visualizations of his flaws. The montage of defeats by a wide range of 'enemies' emphasizes the universality of his weakness.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The fiery anger provides a chaotic and unstable light. The overall palette is one of exposure and weakness. His defeats are shown in quick, almost comical succession.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A central portrait of the flawed individual, surrounded by smaller vignettes that illustrate his universal and easy defeat.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with symbolic effects for the anger-aura and the open-book-heart.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Unstable, flickering light to reflect the subject's lack of control.

Cultural_Anchors: Easy for anyone, anywhere (யாங்கணும் யார்க்கும் எளிது)
